script.line: Hey teens! I'm Prota!
What are you doing here?
Yeah, what makes you think you can just walk into the cool zone?
Is that what this place is called?
Didn't you see the sign? It's literally right there. The Cool Zone.
Oh...uh... I guess I missed it.
Ha! She thinks it's real.
Hahahahaha! Wow.
Look, sorry to take up your time, but... I'm looking for a dog. My dog.
What does your dog look like?
I would describe her as uh... average-looking and...unmonetizeable.
Her name's Minty. I thought maybe if she went this way you might help me find her.
Why would we want to do that?
...Kindness?
Pff. We're teens. All we care about is sick skate tricks and talking about smoking.
Hmm. I thought this generation of teenagers were known for their strong sense of empathy and political engagement.
If anything, today's teens are the most likely to possess the compassion to help me find my dog.
...Anyone?
lol ok nerd
Look, if you're not here to skate, get lost.
(sigh) Okay. Thanks anyway.
Look. If you can prove you're cool, then maybe we'll help you.
You want me to prove I'm cool?
Yeah. You know. Show us you're not a narc and maybe we'll trust you enough to tell you what we know.
Hmmm. Okay. I guess I could prove I'm cool with... uh...
Oh! Wait! I can do some sick skateboard tricks!
You can skateboard?
I can do anything when I'm motivated by Minty. Maybe I'll even teach you a thing or two!
Let's see your moves.
